name: Apps On Cloud
tag_list: crm, helpdesk, sales, automation, project-management, employee, timesheet, customers, sfa
overview:
Apps On Cloud is a provider of internet based social business management software. Combining Customer Relationship Management, Project Management, and Employee Management tools, our all-in-one business automation software can help companies grow their sales and stay organized.

What makes us different from the other guys is that we truly care about the success of small businesses and start-ups. In a world full of large companies and industry leaders, we believe the smaller guys need a fair chance.

We build our software and our products with the smaller businesses in mind, keeping our services affordable, flexible, and always open to feedback. Please feel free to contact us at any time, we’d love to hear from you!
